resources.string:
Hi my name is Kwan Jung. 

I am a Software Engineer with a passion for Android Development. 

I have a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Eastern Michigan University. 
I have experience in Kotlin, Python, JavaScript, and C#. 
I am also familiar with Android Studio, Git, and Linux. 
I am eager to take the next step in my career as an Android Developer. 
I am passionate about mobile development and am committed to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices. 
I am excited about the opportunity to continue growing my skills and contributing to the team's success. 

Thank you for considering my application. 
I look forward to the opportunity to discuss my qualifications further.
